text: Dangshi, wo ceng wei yi bu la xin zhiding tian fang de jichu [shuo]:â€œNi buyao gei wo shezhi renhe pei wu [gong chongbai], ni dang wei huan you zhe [zheng chao he fu chao shi huan you tian fang zhe], zhanli zhe [libai zhe], jugong zhe [gongshun an la zhe] he [bai zhong] koutou zhe er jiejing wo de fangzi [tian fang].
